Name: Craft Craft Craft!
About the game: Demo Is Available / You are in an area where you craft as you wish, sell your crafted items and develop your army. What are you waiting for to make items that only the most skilled craftsmen can do and conquer multiple countries with your army? * 3 basic materials you can process. * 13 different items that you can craft. * 7 different stages for Weapons and Armor. * A skill tree to unlock items. * Quests you can do according to your stage. * 17 countries and villages that you can conquer. * Conquest earnings and a source of items and money that can be collected at regular times. * Upgrades you can make to increase the resource count of conquered nations. * 7 kingdoms where you can sell items, craft and buy materials. * A 'Town Hall' where you can sell items in your own city.
